notification.title: Notifications
notification.invitation.received.title: Invitation Received
notification.invitation.received.message: You are invited to join company {domainName} ({companyName}).
notification.invitation.rejected.title: Invitation Rejected
notification.joindomain.pending.title: Pending To Join
notification.joindomain.pending.message: {userEmail} is pending to join company {domainName} ({companyName}). Please go to [Admin Console]->[User] to approve or reject.
notification.joindomain.approved.title: Welcom To Join Company
notification.joindomain.approved.message: You are approved to join company {domainName} ({companyName}). Before you can participate in the company, you need to log out and log in again.
notification.joindomain.rejected.title: Rejected To Join Company
notification.joindomain.rejected.message: You are rejected to join company {domainName} ({companyName}).
